Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、ハーフって、 そんなに珍しいの？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, are Halfs really all that rare?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……わたしは今までに一度も、ハーフの人に 会った事はなかったけど……
Entry.EnglishText: ...I have never met a single Half until now, so...

Entry.JapaneseText: ごくまれにいる、って話は、 お父さんから聞いた事はあったわ……
Entry.EnglishText: My father had told me that they were extremely uncommon...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマとガジュマは、めったに 恋をしないってコト？
Entry.EnglishText: Is that because Huma and Gajuma don't often fall in love?
That's the natural state of things...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマがガジュマとだなんて……
Entry.EnglishText: For a Huma and Gajuma to be together is just...
